The model - button model to call the properties and events.
member.remarks: A constructor can be used to initializes a new instance of the Button control Button btnNormal = new Button(htmlHelper, this.ID + "_Normal", btnModel) btnNormal.RenderControl() - this method is used to render the button control btnNormal.ID = "btnDelete" - set the control id

member.remarks: A constructor can be used to initializes a new instance of the Button control Button btnNormal = new Button(htmlHelper, this.ID + "_Normal", btnModel) btnNormal.RenderControl() - this method is used to render the button control btnNormal.ID = "btnDelete" - set the control id htmlAttributes - collection of html attributes

member.remarks: A constructor can be used to initializes a new instance of the Button control Button btnNormal = new Button(htmlHelper, this.ID + "_Normal", btnModel, null, Buttons.Normal) btnNormal.RenderControl() - this method is used to render the button control btnNormal.ID = "btnDelete" - set the control id htmlAttributes - collection of html attributes buttonType - get or set the button mode such as normal, toggle, and split

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ButtonModel.Text
member.summary: Gets or Sets the Button Text
member.remarks: This will get or set text of the button control. It will get or set Text in string format.
member.example:
[Controller]
[C#] ButtonModel model = new ButtonModel(); model.Text = "Save"
[VB] Dim model As ButtonModel = New ButtonModel() model.Text = "Save"

member.summary: Gets or Sets the Button Type

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ButtonModel.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or Sets the content Type
member.remarks: This will get or set the content type. It will get or set content type from ContentTypes enum format.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ButtonModel.ImageUrl

[Controller]
[C#] ButtonModel model = new ButtonModel(); model.ImageUrl = "../../Content/icon_save.png"
[VB] Dim model As ButtonModel = New ButtonModel() model.ImageUrl = "../../Content/icon_save.png"

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ButtonModel.SpriteCss
member.summary: Gets or Sets the image url
member.remarks: This will get or set the css class for background image url for button. It will get or set sprite css in string format.
member.example:
[Controller]
[C#] ButtonModel model = new ButtonModel(); model.SpriteCss = "background"
[VB] Dim model As ButtonModel = New ButtonModel() model.SpriteCss = "background"

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ButtonModel.ImagePosition

[Controller]

[Controller]

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ToggleButton

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ToggleButton.#ctor(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ToggleButtonModel,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The HTML helper - object for html helper.
The control id - the id of the toggle button control.
The model - toggle button model to call the properties and events.
The HTML attributes - set html attributes of toggle button control.
member.remarks: A constructor can be used to initializes a new instance of the toggle Button control ToggleButton btnToggle = new ToggleButton(htmlHelper, this.ID + "_Toggle", btnModel) btnToggle.RenderControl() - this method is used to render the toggle button control btnToggle.ID = "btnDelete" - set the control id btnToggle.isCkecked = false - set the control checked property htmlAttributes - collection of html attributes

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ToggleButton.#ctor(System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper,System.String,Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.ToggleButtonModel,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.Buttons)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The HTML helper - object for html helper.
The control id - the id of the control.
The model - toggle button model to call the properties and events.
The HTML attributes - set html attributes of toggle button control.
member.remarks: A constructor can be used to initializes a new instance of the Button control ToggleButton btnToggle = new ToggleButton(htmlHelper, this.ID + "_Normal", btnModel, null, Buttons.Normal) btnToggle.RenderControl() - this method is used to render the button control btnToggle.ID = "btnDelete" - set the control id btnToggle.isCkecked = false - set the control checked property htmlAttributes - collection of html attributes buttonType - get or set the button mode such as normal, toggle, and split

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.AutocompleteTextBox
member.summary: Represents a textbox which list the suggestions.

item.description: The AutocompleteTextBox accepts the string value. It allows the users to enter String or Characters to get the suggestion list and display.
It has MinCharacter properties to maintain size within which the user should enter the characters.
The Delay property will be used to delay upto the milliseconds and then get the suggestion list and display.

member.example:
[Controller]
[C#]
AutocompleteTextBox Autocomplete1=new AutocompleteTextBox();
[VB]
Dim Autocomplete1 as new AutocompleteTextBox()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.AutocompleteTextBox.#ctor(System.String,Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.AutocompleteTextBoxModel,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AutocompleteTextBox class.
member.remarks:
This is the constructor of the AutocompleteTextBox class.
This method is called whenever the new instance of the class is created.
This is mainly used to initialize the new instance variables and properties.
ControlId will get the id of the AutocompleteTextBox and Model will get the instance of the AutocompleteTextBoxModel.

member.remarks: Will create the controls of the AutoCompleteTextbox.

member.summary: This method will add the properties and events from server side to the client script and register the scripts and css files.
member.remarks: In this method all the properties and events which needs to be injected on the clientside should be specified.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.GenericDropDown
member.summary: Represents a GenericDropDown control.

item.description: The GenericDropDown Control is capable of holding MVC controls within it.
It has PopupHTMLContent property to append any HTML content and Controls property to add controls that implement Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.MVCControlBase Interface.
The Text property will be used to show the text content.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.GenericDropDown.#ctor(System.String,Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.GenericDropDownModel,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Web.Mvc.HtmlHelper)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the GenericDropDown class.
member.remarks:
This is the constructor of the GenericDropDown class.
This method is called whenever the new instance of the class is created.
This is mainly used to initialize the new instance variables and properties.
ControlId will get the id of the GenericDropDown and Model will get the instance of the GenericDropDownModel.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.BaseItem.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of a Menu item

remarks.para: The value can be any string which will be later be rendered as HTML anchor element with their attributes defined by LinkAttributes. Please refer the following code snippet to set the value.

member.example:
BaseItem myItem = new BaseItem();
myItem.Value = "ASP.NET MVC";

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.BaseItem.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of a Menu item

remarks.para: The text can be any string which will be later be rendered as HTML anchor element with their attributes defined by LinkAttributes. Please refer the following code snippet to set the text.

member.example:
BaseItem myItem = new BaseItem();
myItem.Text = "ASP.NET MVC";

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.BaseItem.LinkAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets the link HTML attributes of a Menu item

remarks.para: Sets the HTML attributes for the rendered HTML anchor element. Please refer the following code snippet to set the link attributes.

member.example:
BaseItem myItem = new BaseItem();
myItem.LinkAttributes = new {href="http://www.syncfusion.com/products/user-interface-edition/aspnet-mvc"};

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.BaseItem.UrlMapper
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL mapper.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.BaseItem.ImageUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the image url of a Menu item

remarks.para: The image url can be any absolute path of the image to be displayed which will be later rendered as HTML image element. Please refer the below code snippets

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.BaseItem.SpriteCSS
member.summary: Gets or sets the sprite css of a Menu item

remarks.para: The SpriteCSS is an option to render sprite images. The defined css class will be set to the renderd HTML div element.

member.example:
BaseItem myItem = new BaseItem();
myItem.SpriteCSS = "product-icons mvc";

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.BaseItem.Selected
member.summary: Gets or sets the selected state of a Menu item

remarks.para: The possible values are true/false. The node with selected set to true will remain selected on load

member.example:
BaseItem myItem = new BaseItem();
myItem.Selected = true;

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.BaseItem.HasChildren
member.summary: Gets or sets the child items of a Menu item

remarks.para: Takes the list of TreeView item which will be later renderd as child nodes of the current node

member.example:
BaseItem myItem = new BaseItem();
myItem.Children.Add(new BaseItem {Text="Essential Tools",Selected=true });

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.BaseItem.ChildItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the child items of a Menu item

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.MaskEditTextBoxModel.Mask
member.summary: Gets or sets Mask
member.remarks:
This will set the mask of the mask edit text box. It takes the mask in string format.
The following characters with the literals forms the mask.
9-Specifies numeric characters-[0-9]
a-Specifies alphabets[a-z A-Z]
*-Specifies alphanumeric characters[a-z A-z 0-9]
Example: IP address Mask - 999-999-999-999

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.MaskEditTextBox
member.summary: Represents a textbox control whose insertion points automatically skips over the literals of the predefined mask.

item.description: The MaskEditTextBox is a html input control whose input text can be controlled to the applied predefined mask.
While typing the insertion points automatically skips over the literals of the predefined mask.
The Mask property of the MaskEditTextBox can be used to get/set the mask value.
The Value property of the MaskEditTextBox can be used to get/set the user input value.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.NumericTextBox
member.summary: Represents a textbox which accepts only the numeric data with Numeric age symbol at the prefix.

item.description: The NumericageTextBox accepts the Numeric age value alone. It allows the users to enter the numeric data alone.
It has MaxValue and MinValue properties to maintain the range within which the user can able to select.
The Value property will be used to get the user entered value or to initially load a specified value.

member.example:
[Controller]
[C#]
NumericTextBox Numeric1=new NumericTextBox();
[VB]
Dim Numeric1 as new NumericTextBox()

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Mvc.Shared.MvcValidator
member.summary: Represents a validator which validates a control .

item.description: The Validator accepts the target control id. It allows the users to enter String or Characters such that the user gets validation message if the entered string is not in the prescribed format.
It has ValidationExpression property that decides the in which format the user should enter the characters.
The ErrorMessage property will be used to give a custom error message to the user.

ValidaorModel validtorModel = new ValidatorModel();

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DatePickerModel class.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.DatePickerModel.dateformat
member.summary: Gets or sets a format of the date used in the DatePicker
member.remarks: Setting this property will set the format of the date selected in the DatePicker
member.value:
Format a date into a string value with a specified format.
The format can be combinations of the following:
d - day of month (no leading zero)
dd - day of month (two digit)
o - day of the year (no leading zeros)
oo - day of the year (three digit)
D - day name short
DD - day name long
m - month of year (no leading zero)
mm - month of year (two digit)
M - month name short
MM - month name long
y - year (two digit)
yy - year (four digit)
@ - Unix timestamp (ms since 01/01/1970)
'...' - literal text
'' - single quote
anything else - literal text

member.value: if animation need to be added; otherwise, .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.SliderModel.Maximum
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum value for the slider.
member.remarks: Sets the maximum limit for the slider control. Default value is 100

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.SliderModel.Minimum
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum value for the slider.
member.remarks: Sets the minimum limit for the slider control. Default value is 100

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.SliderModel.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation value for the slider.
member.remarks: Setting the orientation value as horizontal, displays the slider control in horizontal direction else vertical. Default value is auto
member.value: if slider control to be displayed in horizontal direction; else vertical

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.SliderModel.Range
member.summary: Gets or sets range value for the slider.
member.remarks: Setting this value to true, the slider will detect if this have two handles and create a stylable range element between these two. Two other possible values are min and max. A min range goes from the slider min to one handle. A max range goes from one handle to the slider max. Default value is false.
member.value: true or false and min or max

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.SliderModel.Step
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval for the slider that takes between min and max.
member.remarks: Setting this value will move the handle in the given interval. Default is 1

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.SliderModel.Values
member.summary: Gets or sets the ranges for the two handle slider control.
member.remarks: Setting this value will display multiple handles for the slider control. Default value is null

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.SliderModel.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial value for the slider handle to be displayed.
member.remarks: Setting this value will display the slider handle in the given position initially. Default value is 0.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.jQueryTab.Model
member.summary: Gets or sets the value for the Tab properties like IdPrefix value, Selected value, Event for the tab etc
member.remarks:
Setting this property will define the behavior of tab control like
Event - Gets or sets the default event for the tab control .
Cache - Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to cache remote tabs content.
Collapsible - Gets or sets a value indicating whether to allow an already selected tab to become unselected again upon reselection.
Cookie - Gets or sets to store the latest selected tab in a cookie.
Deselectable - Similar to Collapsible property. Deprecated in jQuery UI 1.7
Disabled - Gets or sets the tab items to be disabled.
Items - Gets or sets the tab items to be added.
Effects - Gets or sets the animation effects need to be added when the tab gets closed or opened
IdPrefix - Gets or sets the id prefix for the tab control.
PanelTemplate - Gets or sets the HTML template for the new tab panel which is created by adding a tab using add method.
Selected - Gets or sets the tab index which will be selected on initialization.
Spinner - Gets or sets the HTML content to be shown in a tab title while remote content is loading.
ClientSideOnSelect - Gets or sets when the user selects the tab.
ClientSideOnLoad - Gets or sets when the tab loads.
ClientSideOnShow - Gets or sets when the tab item gets displayed.
ClientSideOnAdd - Gets or sets when the user adds the tab item programmatically
ClientSideOnRemove - Gets or sets when the user removes the tab item programmatically
ClientSideOnEnable - Gets or sets when the user enables the tab item programmatically.
ClientSideOnDisable - Gets or sets when the user disables the tab item programmatically.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.Menu
member.summary: MenuClass Represents a control that displays hierarchical data in a Menu structure that has items that can expand , collapse, and customize.
member.remarks:
A Menu an outline view is a graphical user interface element (widget) that presents a hierarchical view of information. Menu Class is used to contains all the necessary details of the data to display in the hierarchy format.
Features of the Menucontrols
1. Extensive Skins support to Customize Menu
2. Rich client side events
